column4: Hey, I just installed ubuntu breezy and can't get DVD playback to work with xine or totem
spitting errors about unable to read NAV packet
mplayer however seems to be able to play the DVD fine
they only thing i have been able to find is a bunch of nonsense about libdvdcss2
and its working since mplayer can play the dvd
you could try updating your libdvdnav
newest, this is a fresh install
does this happen at initialization or midstream?
did you install libdvdcss after xine-ui, or before?
totem is aPoS -- I never use it -- excpet as a plugin/MIME handler
I cant get xine to work either
